scripts.provision: apt-get update -y && apt-get install dnsmasq hostapd iw -y
scripts.prep: npm update ; sudo npm install bower -g ; bower install ; sudo rm /usr/local/etc/dhcpcd.conf ; sudo mkdir /usr/local/etc/hostapd ; sudo mkdir /usr/local/etc/wpa_supplicant ; sudo mkdir /var/lib/misc
scripts.disconnect: sudo ifconfig wlan0 down && for k in `ps | awk '/'wlan0'/{print $1}'`; do kill $k 2>/dev/null; done
